price: 87. Waxayna (gaalada mushrikiinta ah) ula imaan Alle maalintaas hoggaansan dhan, wayna ka tegi oo waayi waxay been abuuran jireen (oo ilaahyo been ah).
arabic: وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alqaw ilā al-lahi yawma-idhin al-salama waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
